PrivacyBreach.title: Ever been in a moment like this?
PrivacyBreach.subtitle: If you can't avoid it, hide it perfectly.
PrivacyBreach.case1_title: üîê A Safe Second Space You Can Show
PrivacyBreach.case1_situation: "Let me see your phone." Your partner enters your usual password and starts browsing through your phone.
PrivacyBreach.case1_action: What they don't know is that the password they're using is actually a decoy.
PrivacyBreach.case1_resolution: Your partner only sees ordinary notes and leaves satisfied. Your surprise plans and real secrets remain perfectly safe.
PrivacyBreach.case2_situation: Your partner suspects your app password is fake and aggressively demands the real one in this critical moment.
PrivacyBreach.case2_action: You don't need to panic at all.
PrivacyBreach.case2_resolution: It's impossible to distinguish between fake and real passwords by any means. They can't even tell you're using premium features.
PrivacyBreach.case3_situation: "Who's messaging you this late?" A simple WhatsApp from a coworker instantly kills the mood at home.
PrivacyBreach.case3_action: Thanks to Off The Record's secret conversation features and disguised notifications, you no longer need to explain every innocent work message.
PrivacyBreach.case3_resolution: Private conversations stay private, avoiding unnecessary emotional exhaustion and relationship drama.
PrivacyBreach.case4_situation: While carpooling with a colleague, a secret chat notification appears on the CarPlay screen.
PrivacyBreach.case4_action: Off The Record disguises this notification as ordinary ad text like '[Ad] AI Subscription 20% Off - Today Only'.
PrivacyBreach.case4_resolution: Your colleague dismisses it as an ad without suspicion, and your secret chat remains safely protected.
PrivacyBreach.conclusion: Off The Record was created to protect your precious privacy from these situations. Love exists, but personal space deserves respect. Off The Record supports your healthy personal boundaries.

Features.title: Core Features for Your Privacy
Features.subtitle: Off The Record provides powerful tools to safeguard your digital life.
Features.feature1_description: Separates regular and secret notes, appearing as a simple memo app on the surface.
Features.feature2_description: From basic PIN to dual passwords and Kill Switch, we perfectly protect your secrets.
Features.feature3_description: Supports secure conversations with end-to-end encryption based on the Signal protocol.
Features.feature4_description: Use premium features while appearing as a basic user to avoid suspicion, or maintain ads to hide your subscription status.
Features.feature5_description: Records time, video, and audio of incorrect PIN attempts to detect unauthorized access.
Features.feature6_description: All conversations and content are stored only on your device, never on our servers.

Security.title: Our Promise: True Privacy Protection
Security.subtitle: Off The Record goes beyond just protecting content; it protects the very fact that you desire privacy. These are our core principles for securing your digital life.
Security.principle1_description: All conversations and content are never stored on our servers. They are kept securely only on your device. Even if our servers are hacked, your secrets will not be exposed.
Security.principle2_description: All your data is immediately encrypted on your device with the latest technology like AES-256-CBC. The PIN is only used to derive the encryption key and is never stored. The key is also managed securely in memory.
Security.principle3_description: From a basic PIN and dual passwords to a Kill Switch for emergencies. Sensitive encryption keys are protected in memory while the app is running and are immediately erased after use.
Security.philosophy_quote: ‚ÄúWe believe privacy is not a sign of distrust, but an expression of healthy personal space. Off The Record is not just an app; it's a new paradigm for privacy in the digital age. With perfect disguise, multi-layered security, and emergency preparedness - your secrets are safer than ever.‚Äù
